line: none of that not while you are living under my roof
look just because i know about you two does not mean i like looking at it
are not you supposed to be at an audition for another hour
well sorry if not a middle aged black woman
and also sorry if sometimes i go to the wrong audition
okay look if i have to pretend i do not know about you two then you two are gonna have to pretend there is nothing to know about
yeah my mom sent me a family heirloom that once belonged to my grandmother
a year ago i did not even have a family and now i have heirlooms for crying out loud
why would my mother send me a fur
does not she know me but at all
plus i have a perfectly fine coat that no innocent animal suffered to make
yeah just some 9 year old filipino kids who worked their fingers bloody for 12 cents an hour
that did not happen i made that up
you cannot put up flyers in here
oh umm just getting rid of a couple of things
this is all of your things
no but it is good it is emily thinks we should get all new stuff
stuff that is just ours together
so basically this is a getting rid of everything rachel ever used sale
hey ross you are okay with that
look if i can just do what emily wants and get her to new york sure everything will be fine
okay but do not you think this is a little extreme
when my friend silvies husband said someone elses name in bed she cursed him and turned his thingy green
what emily thinks rosss furniture has got rachel coodies
everythings gettin all messed up yknow
emily will not let ross see rachel we are not gonna stop seeing rachel hence ross stops seeing us
yeah i know we are losing ross joey said hence
look not happy about this either but yknow if if ross says he is happy then we are just gonna have to keep our feelings about emily to ourselves
but yknow an actor act cool
storage rooms give me the creeps
monica come on please hurry up honey
rachel if you want the little round waffles you gotta have to wait until i find the little waffle iron
i want the little round waffles
right underneath the can of of bug bomb
i wonder if the best place to put something that cooks food is underneath the can of poison
i do not know what gonna do about this coat
all right what do you think
no no no it is just a bit sudden
i love you too all righty
i just got off the phone with emily and it looks like moving to a new apartment
well her thought is and i agree fresh new furniture why not a fresh new apartment
her cousin has this great place to sublet it is got a view of the river on one side and columbia on the other
that is like three trains away
i love to ride that rail
so you are really okay with this
i mean it is it is kinda far from work but uh yknow get so much done on the commute
i been given the gift of time
now that is so funny because last christmas i got the gift of space
we should get them together and make a continuum
man what is emily doing to him
we were we were just in the storage area and we saw this really creepy man
it was like this crazy eyed hairy beast man
he was like a like a bigfoot or a yeti or something
and he came at us with an axe so rachel had to use a bug bomb on him
yeah i i i just pulled the tab and i just fogged his yeti ass
uhh like dark hair bushy beard
yeah he just got back from like this four month trek in the andes
yknow you always stick up for the people we fog
you might not remember us but we are the girls that fogged you
we are we are really sorry we fogged you
just so you know we we did not mean to fog you we thought you were like a yeti or something
sorry to bother you but i do not think we can accept your acceptance of our apology it just does not really seem like you mean it
i mean you had forgive me if i fogged you
well you did a little bit
oh my god honey so sorry
so listen you know my friend chris who owns the crematorium
he says that he would cremate my fur coat for free if i umm yknow bring in the next person i know who dies
oh my god look at these pelts
do not get too attached she is having it cremated
uhh phoebe honey honey i know you are quirky and i get a big kick out of it we all do actually but if you destroy a coat like this that is like a crime against nature
okay so to you death is fashion
heres phoebe umm sporting uh yknow cutting edge hairy carcass from yknow the steal traps of wintry russia
i mean you really thing this looks good
i know i miss you too
i cannot wait to see you
no no this is my collection of fossil samples
yknow ben ben took his first steps right over there
hey remember when i ran into this thing and it kinda knocked me out a little
to tell you the truth i wish i did not have to move
uhh are you saying that you are not entirely happy about this
well i mean if uh if emily gave me a choice
ross why are you listening to her
it is not right what emily wants you to do
look now you guys said i only had to keep my mouth shut as long as ross was happy right
well he just told me that he is not entirely happy
no ross we do not hate emily
we we just we just think that you are having to sacrifice a whole lot to make her happy
look we just think that maybe she is being a little unreasonable
how about we have this conversation when one of you guys gets married
you have no idea what it takes to make a marriage work
all right it is about compromise
because it is not all laughing happy candy in the sky drinking coffee at central perk all the time
it is what grown ups do
you guys hang out at the coffeehouse way too much
god i feel so guilty about ross
i kinda feel like it is my fault
if you just kept this to yourself none of this would have happened
well keeping so many things to myself these days something was bound to slip out
well i think it is very brave what you said
all right i cannot sit here anymore
pheebs what are you doing with the coat
how about the whole animal rights thing
well been reading up and for your information minks are not very nice
okay i it is the best thing ever had wrapped around me including phil huntley
so you like the short hair better
i had to cut my hair to get rid of the uh fogger smell
i would i would have never fogged you if yknow if you had not looked so
some people are just into appearances
you do not even know me
come on you got the shopping bags and the sacks catalog
so from that you think you have got me all figured out
yknow i i could have toys for underprivileged kids in here
well yknow if if kids like to play with capri pants
and you are worse because you are sticking to your stupid snap judgement
you cannot even open up your mind for a second to see if you are wrong
what does that say about you
the pizza place across the street any good
you can keep yelling if there is more
are you still mad at us
because we have an sorry song
look ross i feel really bad
i mean you are going through all this stuff and i just acted like a jerk
you are kinda stepping on the song
look we were way out of line we totally support you
whatever you decide whatever you do
okay now you are just taking lines right out of the song
i really need you guys right now
why do not you come over tonight
okay let us get some perspective people it is not like wearing a seeing eye dog coat
hey yknow ross i think i kinda understand why i kinda lost it today
yeah you see umm well an actor
so i gotta keep my emotions right at the surface yknow
i gotta lot of balls in the air
guys like me yknow you wander around you are alone
oh i went to have pizza
that yeti is one smooth talker
i hope you are not full because dinners almost ready
yeah yknow i i think just gonna hang out in my room
listen if emily knew i was here having dinner you with you she would flip out and you know it
it is okay i really i do not mind
it uh it would really mean a lot to me if you stayed
i have not seen him in so long
oh god i really missed that fat b st rd
i just realized this might be the last time we will all be hanging out together
it is almost as if he knew
yeah uh you you tracked him down
yeah yeah we are just having dinner
uh yeah sure uh hold on
so who am i saying hello too
well uh i do not know about who is here but i can tell you for damn sure who is not here and that is rachel
ross knows better than that by now
oh yeah there there she is
how can you do this too me
i thought made my feelings about rachel perfectly clear
look emily just having dinner with my friends okay
you obviously cannot keep away from her
look moving for you cutting friends out of my life for you
please just get on the plane and come to new york
okay you will see you are the only person i want to be with
feel better when there and i can know where you are all the time
well you cannot know where i am all the time
look this marriage is never gonna work if you do not trust me
i think it is going okay
you can only see the back of his head
well i guess that is it
ross honey is there anything we can do
you can help me get my furniture back from gunther
and yknow okay most of these probably wanted to be coats
all right fine now i get it
